segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, it's quite surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how far he's leaning to get to that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's amazing he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's ever done something like this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems to be really determined to get those cookies, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised seeing him take such a risk just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He must really love cookies to go through all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks so precarious, it's surprising he's managing to stay up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he should just ask for the cookies instead of doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is quite surprising to me.
segments.speaker: PAR
